amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 9: Nos. 216, 219, 220, 221, 222, 223, 224, 225, 226, 227, 228, 229, 230, 231, 232, 233, 234, 235, 236, 237, and 238.
